branchCategory.name: Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>The SV series employs a multi-connector instead of the conventional lead wires for internal manifold wiring. By connecting each block with a connector, changes to manifold stations are greatly simplified. Cassette base type manifolds offer the ultimate in flexibility. Manifold sections can be added using a simple release mechanism. Conventional tie-rod base type manifolds are also available. The use of 34 pin connectors allows up to 16 stations with double solenoids.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-SV2000, 5 Port Solenoid Valve, All Types
branchItem.description: <p>The SV series employs a multi-connector instead of the conventional lead wires for internal manifold wiring. By connecting each block with a connector, changes to manifold stations are greatly simplified. Cassette base type manifolds offer the ultimate in flexibility. Manifold sections can be added using a simple release mechanism. Conventional tie-rod base type manifolds are also available. The use of 34 pin connectors allows up to 16 stations with double solenoids.</p>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Fluid: air <LI>Operating pressure range: -100kPa to 0.7MPa <LI>Response time ms (at 0.5MPa): 33 or less <LI>Coil rated voltage: 12, 24VDC <LI>Ambient &amp; fluid temperature: -10 to 50° C <LI>Material restriction: copper metal, zinc, stainless steel 316&nbsp;&nbsp;</LI></UL>
